name: Running Killer
description:
The best RPG flip parkour fighting game is coming!

Uncover a cyberpunk ninja parkour game designed to give you an adrenaline rush! Flip, jump, fall, and vault over obstacles to set all new records. Pick up your futuristic weapons, run in cyberpunk cities and test your ultimate skills! Embark on your mad cyberpunk adventure full of crime, wars, robots, and desires! Race like a real Ninja! Be the legend!

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap to kill and dodge! Hack and slash!
- Run and do amazing parkour tricks
- Move the character to jump or dash
- Avoid various obstacles and head to the goal point
- Attack enemies who try to stop you on the smashy road!

KEY FEATURES
- Parkour & free running acrobatics! The most thrilling and fun running game in future cities with cyberpunk style! The battle is full of joy and randomness!
- Easy to play! Cool & free parkour game with deadly super attacks and Ninja skills! Be the best speed runner!
- 10+ iconic characters and each is with unique battle skills!
- Futuristic enemies: Mutant Syndicate, Crowd Brawler, and more to explore!
- High-tech ninja weapons & gadgets! Equip yourself with mighty weapons and smash everything in front of you!
- Huge variety of clothing sets for your characters!
- Marvelous skills: Absolute Defense, Freezing Strike, Snake Wild Dance, etc.
- Exciting and thrilling map themes: Sleepless City, Metropolis, Sakura Street, Windjammer Guild, and more to discover! A variety of cool locations to unlock！
- Engaging gameplay with adventurous cyberpunk scenes!
- Realistic 3D ragdoll physics and simulation with comfortable controls
- Incredibly fun, addictive & endless gameplay!

Running Killer is a thrilling freestyle parkour and battle game in the city of sins, where a lot of amazing killing and deadly street battle charisma are waiting for you. If you are looking for a free action game or parkour game with cyberpunk style, you should definitely give it a try! :D
